title: Four shot, two critically injured in shooting at "Detroit's Finest" hall in Warren
content:
Autoplay:Violent shootout at banquet center in WarrenCONNECTING...
WARREN, Mich. (WXYZ) - Warren police say four people were shot during a fight early Sunday morning at a hall near the Detroit border.
It happened around 2 a.m. at the "Detroit's Finest" hall located in the 13800 block of 8 Mile Rd.
About 150 people were inside the hall when a fight broke out inside. Management was able to separate the people involved and escort them outside.
Another fight broke out between the people in two cars, and one person pulled out a gun and opened fire.
In all, four people were shot, and three were taken to the hospital. Two of them are still in critical condition, while the fourth received a minor injury and was treated at the scene by EMS.
Police are still investigating and ask anyone with information to call Warren police.
